reviews.review: I have enjoyed this game ever since I joined Steam back in the beginning of 2019. It's a super fun game that can be played by anyone; just one complaint. It will not run very well on potatoes. It's understandably because it's a very graphic heavy game and I am planning on getting a new gaming computer in the near future. Until then... all in all, definitely a yes because it is too fun to resist not playing it more than once. A feel of nostalgia.
This game is one of the best made by valve
speedy thing goes in, speedy thing comes out

The mechanics were good, and I loved how the frames looked if you spun like crazy (because you have a "little" bit of serious brain damage). The story line was also amazing, though some of the parts were a little tricky, but that's what made it so fun,as well as the time it took to complete it, since I, personally, hate short games.

Absolutely garbage of a game. I buy it expecting some portal 1 action but no? the game is completely changed! Literally about to ctrl-c ctrl-v my review of Portal 1 (With some minor differences); Amazing game! Even more amazing story then Portal 1, experienced no bugs so far (I say "So far" because i have not beat Portal 2 yet, I'm on chapter 6: The Fall), I would 100% pay full price for this (Â£7.19 is a bargain for the amount of content you get!), I got this as a bundle with Portal 1 for Â£10.49. Great game (P.S., I do enjoy eating....Wheat bread).
